<h1> Abdul-Nasah Soale</h1>
<hr>
Abdul-Nasah Soale is a Ph.D. Candidate in the Department of Statistical Science at the Fox School of Business at Temple University. He received his B.S. degree in Actuarial Science from Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology in Ghana, and his M.S. degree in Mathematical Science from East Tennessee State University. 

His current research interests include dimension reduction, multivariate statistics, causal inference in networks, and text analysis. His Ph.D. thesis title is "On Sufficient Dimension Reduction via Asymmetric Least Squares", advised by Dr. Yuexiao Dong. <br><br>
